name: CatExpress
description:
Cat Express is a relaxing and healing game that combines running, fishing, and collecting.

Features

  • Express Delivery
    By jumping and dodging various obstacles, deliver express to the people in the town.

  • Customize Cat Room
    Use the coins earned through delivering express to buy various furniture to customize the cat room.

  • Fishing
    Casual fishing, catch all kinds of fish and sell them for a good price at the fish store!
